title: High Gender Equality Rating
description: In 2023, Kyrgyzstan achieved a CPIA gender equality rating of 4.5, indicating a relatively high level of gender equality compared to other countries.

title: Widespread Access to Handwashing Facilities
description: As of 2019, 98.66% of the urban population in Kyrgyzstan had access to basic handwashing facilities, including soap and water, highlighting excellent urban hygiene infrastructure.

title: Limited Aid from Luxembourg
description: In 2015, Kyrgyzstan received one of the lowest net bilateral aid flows from Luxembourg, amounting to approximately $10,000.
